title: Wizard Hat
summaries: The Wizard Hat is an armor item that can be equipped in the helmet slot. It increases the player's magic damage by 5% / 15% and grants 4 / 2 additional defense. It is guaranteed to be dropped by Tim.
In Celebrationmk10 and Getfixedboi worlds, the Wizard Hat also grants an additional minion slot.

The Wizard Hat is part of the <linked>Wizard set</linked>, which further consists of a <linked>Mystic Robe</linked> or any gem-augmented <linked>Robe</linked>. It provides a <linked>set bonus</linked> of +10% magic <linked>critical strike</linked> chance. The <linked>Magic Hat</linked> is an alternative for the helmet slot.

statistics.Defense: 4 / 2
statistics.Tooltip: 5% increased magic damage / 15% increased magic damage
